member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to A CTL used to create this chain did not have a valid signature..

member.name: P:BinaryStudio.Security.Cryptography.Certificates.Properties.Resources.CERT_TRUST_CTL_IS_NOT_TIME_VALID
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to A certificate trust list (CTL) used to create this chain was not time valid..

member.name: P:BinaryStudio.Security.Cryptography.Certificates.Properties.Resources.CERT_TRUST_CTL_IS_NOT_VALID_FOR_USAGE
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to A CTL used to create this chain is not valid for this usage..

member.name: P:BinaryStudio.Security.Cryptography.Certificates.Properties.Resources.CERT_TRUST_HAS_EXCLUDED_NAME_CONSTRAINT
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The certificate or one of the certificates in the certificate chain has a name constraints extension, and one of the name choices in the end certificate is explicitly excluded..

member.name: P:BinaryStudio.Security.Cryptography.Certificates.Properties.Resources.CERT_TRUST_HAS_NOT_DEFINED_NAME_CONSTRAINT
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The certificate or one of the certificates in the certificate chain has a name constraints extension and a name constraint is missing for one of the name choices in the end certificate..

member.name: P:BinaryStudio.Security.Cryptography.Certificates.Properties.Resources.CERT_TRUST_HAS_NOT_PERMITTED_NAME_CONSTRAINT
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The certificate or one of the certificates in the certificate chain has a name constraints extension, and there is not a permitted name constraint for one of the name choices in the end certificate..

member.name: P:BinaryStudio.Security.Cryptography.Certificates.Properties.Resources.CERT_TRUST_HAS_NOT_SUPPORTED_CRITICAL_EXT
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The certificate does not support a critical extension..

member.name: P:BinaryStudio.Security.Cryptography.Certificates.Properties.Resources.CERT_TRUST_HAS_NOT_SUPPORTED_NAME_CONSTRAINT
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The certificate or one of the certificates in the certificate chain has a name constraints extension that contains unsupported fields. The minimum and maximum fields are not supported. Thus minimum must always be zero and maximum must always be absent. Only UPN is supported for an Other Name..

member.name: P:BinaryStudio.Security.Cryptography.Certificates.Properties.Resources.CERT_TRUST_HAS_WEAK_HYGIENE
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to CERT_TRUST_HAS_WEAK_HYGIENE.

member.name: P:BinaryStudio.Security.Cryptography.Certificates.Properties.Resources.CERT_TRUST_HAS_WEAK_SIGNATURE
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The certificate has not been strong signed. Typically this indicates that the MD2 or MD5 hashing algorithms were used to create a hash of the certificate..

member.name: P:BinaryStudio.Security.Cryptography.Certificates.Properties.Resources.CERT_TRUST_INVALID_BASIC_CONSTRAINTS
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The certificate or one of the certificates in the certificate chain has a basic constraints extension, and either the certificate cannot be used to issue other certificates, or the chain path length has been exceeded..

member.name: P:BinaryStudio.Security.Cryptography.Certificates.Properties.Resources.CERT_TRUST_INVALID_EXTENSION
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to One of the certificates has an extension that is not valid..

member.name: P:BinaryStudio.Security.Cryptography.Certificates.Properties.Resources.CERT_TRUST_INVALID_NAME_CONSTRAINTS
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The certificate or one of the certificates in the certificate chain has a name constraints extension that is not valid..

member.name: P:BinaryStudio.Security.Cryptography.Certificates.Properties.Resources.CERT_TRUST_INVALID_POLICY_CONSTRAINTS
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The certificate or one of the certificates in the certificate chain has a policy constraints extension, and one of the issued certificates has a disallowed policy mapping extension or does not have a required issuance policies extension..

member.name: P:BinaryStudio.Security.Cryptography.Certificates.Properties.Resources.CERT_TRUST_IS_CYCLIC
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to One of the certificates in the chain was issued by a certification authority that the original certificate had certified..
